snippet: For the fifth-season premiere of AMC’s “Breaking Bad,” a criminal caper required a lot of resourcefulness, if not necessarily scientific accuracy, by production designers.
abstract: Fifth-season premiere of AMC television series Breaking Bad features criminal caper that required a lot of resourcefulness on the part of production designers to devise.
lead_paragraph: For the fifth-season premiere of AMC’s “Breaking Bad,” a criminal caper required a lot of resourcefulness, if not necessarily scientific accuracy, by production designers.

headline.main: Creative Abetting of a TV Drug Lord
headline.print_headline: Creative Abetting Of a TV Drug Lord
